event.title: Located on the country's central coast, it is a popular summer

data.event: Located on the country's central coast, it is a popular summer resort for the population of Santiago.

event.title: 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Algarrobo spans

data.event: According to the 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Algarrobo spans an area of 175.6 km2 (68 sq mi) and has 8,601 inhabitants (4,369 men and 4,232 women).
The population grew by 44.1% (2,633 persons) between the 1992 and 2002 censuses.

event.title: is directly elected every four years

data.event: As a commune, Algarrobo is a third-level administrative division of Chile administered by a municipal council, headed by an alcalde who is directly elected every four years.
